data.actual_result: The button pops up by sliding down
data.expected_result: The Create invite button shouldn't have any sort of animation while switching
data.short_description: The Create invite button has an odd slide animation when you switch servers
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a server where you have perms to create invites - Open channel drawer - Scroll down in the channel list so the Create invite button is offscreen (important step) - Switch to a different server where you also have create invite permissions
